p: Folin-Ciocalteu (FC) Reagent method was used for the determination of polyphenols in the aqueous BvRM and BvLM extracts. In 1 mL of roots and leaves extract separately, FC-reagent (0.5 mL) and 20% (w/v) solution of Na 2CO 3 was added. Mixture was incubated at room temperature for 15 min and absorbance was recorded at 650 nm along with standard (gallic acid) ( Baba and Malik, 2015).
